EmailTemplate.name: Follow up from MBO Partners (1328118099.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Follow up from MBO Partners (1328118099.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Dear David,
Some time ago you requested information regarding the services offered by MBO Partners and when I reached out you said that it was not a good time but in the new year you would like me to reach out again. Now might not be the right time for you, but whatever your work life stage, I also hope you can join me in celebrating the news that independent work life in America has arrived. Our company is well into a year-long effort called The State of Independence in America. I encourage you to view some very interesting findings on the size and trends for independent work in our nation.
We also have a number of consultant resources that we continually update that you may find helpful. You may find them here: http://www.mbopartners.com/resources.
If you are interested in hearing more about the MBO program please schedule a time to speak on my calendar link below and I will reach out then.
I look forward to speaking with you soon!
Regards,
Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
